trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object that renders a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>呈现的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> object represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>对象表示的标志符号的序列中的一种字体在单个大小，并且一种呈现样式的单个字面。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>包含字体标志符号索引和各个标志符号位置等的详细信息。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: In addition, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>包含从中，生成运行的原始 Unicode 码位字符标志符号缓冲区偏移量的映射信息，和每个字符以及每个标志符号标志。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: Each glyph in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
trans-unit.target: 每个字形中<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>定义度量值，用于指定其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>的对齐方式</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 下图定义两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters **Freezable Features:** A GlyphRunDrawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")的两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量**可冻结功能︰** GlyphRunDrawing 是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: **Caution:** GlyphRunDrawing objects do not support partial trust execution.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰** GlyphRunDrawing 对象不支持部分信任的执行。

trans-unit.source: An application must have full trust permissions to use GlyphRunDrawing objects.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须具有完全信任权限使用 GlyphRunDrawing 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> class by specifying the foreground brush and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>类通过指定的背景画笔和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The foreground brush to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 前景画笔用于<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> to use in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> to use in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground brush of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的前景画笔<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that paints the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制的画笔<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that describes the text to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>描述要绘制的文本。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that describes the text to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>描述要绘制的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
